headline.main: WOMEN WILL OPEN WAR POSTER DRIVE; 5,000 Billboards to Be Used in Nation to Fortify the Defense Spirit in U.S. HITLER BOOTS DEPICTED First Appeal to Show Nazi Threat to Manhattan, Group Here Is Told

lead_paragraph: Mrs. Rushmore Patterson, chairman of the women's division of the Committee to Defend America by Aiding the Allies, has announced that plans have been completed for a nation-wide poster campaign to fortify further defense spirit in the United States.
abstract: Com to Defend Amer by Aiding Allies women's div to open war poster drive
snippet: Mrs. Rushmore Patterson, chairman of the women's division of the Committee to Defend America by Aiding the Allies, has announced that plans have been completed for a nation-wide poster campaign to fortify further defense spirit in the United State...
